content: But, the beauty of it, is that you don't have to! The beauty of other people's opinions on you, is that they're just other people's opinions: they have no effect on you; only their actions can have an effect on you. Your opinions of yourself, though, they can have an effect which can be constructive or destructive. That's whence the "don't let them get to you", which can be so annoying, draws its truth.
